name: Helioptile
flavorText:
They make their home in deserts. They can
generate their energy from basking in the sun,
so eating food is not a requirement.

previous.name: Clawitzer
previous.flavorText:
Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of
water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

next.name: Heliolisk
next.flavorText:
They flare their frills and generate energy.
A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient
electricity to power a skyscraper.
